response.overview: Asia sings, Medhi writes the music: together they dream of making it big with their music. But the gun found under the pillow of Youssef, Medhi's little brother, will catapult them into a rap-fuelled adventure involving suburban thugs, Siberian gangsters and robberies in Chinese massage parlours. Will the two manage to shoot the video clip for “Il Mondo è Nostro” (The World is Ours), the song that will be their big break?
response.title: The World Is Ours
